citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:34 pm on 14-
DEC -2023. Upon arrival at the facility I spoke to a family member who said the licensee would not be back for several
hours and no one else was available who could accompany an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:34 pm on 14-
DEC -2023. Upon arrival at the facility I spoke to a family member who said the licensee would not be back for several 
hours and no one else was available who could accompany an inspection. 
 
 
End Section
